AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fighters Guild associate
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As a low ranking member of the Fighters Guild, [PAWN_nameDef] was usually given the least desirable assignments, the ones that paid the least, and the ones that promised no fame. This usually meant clearing out a rat infestation from someones house. Though [PAWN_nameDef] persevered, for eventually [PAWN_pronoun] would recieve a promotion.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fighters Guild journeyman
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Being a journeyman, [PAWN_nameDef] was occasionally given some dangerous assignments. Sometimes it would involve clearing poachers out of a kwama egg mine, sometimes dealing with a gang holed up in an ancestral tomb, or sometimes [PAWN_nameDef] had to kill a few rats in someones house.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fighters Guild drillmaster
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Having served in the legion, [PAWN_nameDef] knew full what to expect in combat. [PAWN_pronoun] made great use of the knowledge training the recruits of Balmora's Fighters Guild. Most would never be promoted past journeyman, but occasionally [PAWN_nameDef] saw something special in one.
